text: Va [sarançom] Bani Isroilro az darjo guzarondem,on goh Fir'avn va sipohijonaş az rūji sitam va taçovuz dar paji onon raftand, to hangome ki ƣarqoʙi Ū [Fir'avn]-ro faro girift, [ʙo noumedī] guft: «Imon ovardam, ki heç ma'ʙude [ʙar haq] nest, magar kase, ki Bani Isroil ʙa Ū imon ovardaand va man az taslimşudagonam»
